name: Memo Maze Runner!
description:
Memo Maze Runner! -This is a 3D maze runner game that test your wayfinding skill and memorization.

Features:

• Map memorization in limited time

• Time limit

• Limited lives

• Pickups (Health & Map)

• Monster bat that deals damage to the  player if the player went to the wrong path

• Escape from the maze to win

Instruction:

Press 'ESC' to pause

Press WASD keys to move

Press Spacebar key to jump

Move Mouse to adjust view

Credits:

Created by Low Han Cheng
